organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Documents relating to the VMD's internal Alert Group which considers significance of pharmacovigilance data received on veterinary medicinal products

extras.value: Raw signalsthat are detected  are frequently false positives, and  require considerable effort to validate and confirm, which will be done through the Veterinary Products Committee (VPC) and/or European scientific committees where the final decsion on action is taken. It would be inappropriate to publish unconfirmed findings, as this could result in media scares and political embrassment when it transpires that there is no issue of concern.
